title: GET_INTERIOR_PORTAL_COUNT
content:
0xD05BB8B1// GetInteriorPortalCount
int GET_INTERIOR_PORTAL_COUNT(int interiorId);Parameters:interiorId: The target interior.Returns: The amount of portals in interior.Examples:Lualocal playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)

if interiorId ~= 0 then
  local count = GetInteriorPortalCount(interiorId)
  print("interior " .. interiorId .. "has " .. count .. " portals")
end
codeBlocks:
local playerPed = PlayerPedId()
local interiorId = GetInteriorFromEntity(playerPed)

if interiorId ~= 0 then
  local count = GetInteriorPortalCount(interiorId)
end
